actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 55 of title 10, United States Code, to provide maternity benefits to wives of certain former members of the uniformed services and to certain former female members.

summary.text: Authorizes maternity benefits for wives of specified former members of the uniformed services and to specified former female members of such services. (Adds 10 U.S.C. 1089).

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 55 of title 10, United States Code, to provide maternity benefits to wives of certain former members of the uniformed services and to certain former female members.
